Terms of Service

Effective Date: 16-04-2025

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using Smart Applicant ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to all terms, you may not use our Service.

2. Service Description

Smart Applicant provides resume analysis tools to help users optimize their resumes for applicant tracking systems (ATS). We offer both free and premium services as described on our website.

3. User Obligations

You agree to:

  • Provide accurate information when creating an account
  • Not upload content that violates intellectual property rights
  • Not use the Service for any illegal purpose
  • Not attempt to reverse engineer or disrupt the Service

4. Account Registration

To access certain features, you must register for an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities under your account.

5. Intellectual Property

All content and technology comprising the Service are owned by Zinando Concepts or its licensors. You retain ownership of any resumes or materials you upload, but grant us a license to process them for Service provision.

6. Disclaimers

The Service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee:

  • That your resume will pass any specific ATS
  • That you will obtain interviews or employment
  • Uninterrupted or error-free service

7. Limitation of Liability

Zinando Concepts shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from use of the Service. Our total liability for any claims shall not exceed the amount you paid for services in the last 12 months.

8. Termination

We may suspend or terminate your access to the Service at any time for violation of these Terms. You may terminate your account at any time by contacting us.

9. Governing Law

These Terms shall be governed by the laws of Nigeria. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Oyo State.

10. Changes to Terms

We may modify these Terms at any time. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance. We will notify registered users of material changes via email.

11. Contact Information
